message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: void process() {
    Iterator<String> fileIterator = fileContent.iterator();
    int state = 0;
    String token = null;
    while(fileIterator.hasNext()){
        switch (state) {
            case 0:
                token = fileIterator.next();
                if (token.equals("Table")) {
                    System.out.println(token);
                    state = 1;
                } else {
                    System.err.println("Corrupt file format at state 0: "+ token);
                    System.exit(0);
                }
                break;
        }
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: The problem is that you are not looping through the iterator. You need to add a while loop to iterate through all the elements in the iterator. Also, you should declare your iterator and token as String type since you are comparing it with a string.
